alert.note: Alert for Eastern Panhandle, Crescent Lake NWR; Niobrara Valley, Fort Niobrara NWR, Samuel R McKelvie National Forest (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 11 at 2:33PM CDT until April 11 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS LIKELY THIS AFTERNOON AND EVENING... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CDT /8 PM MDT/ THIS EVENING FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 204 AND 208... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zone 204. Fire weather zone 206. Fire weather zone 208. Fire weather zone 209. Fire weather zone 210. Fire weather zone 219. * WINDS...Southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 10 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will spread rapidly and will be difficult to control. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Panhandle, Crescent Lake NWR; Niobrara Valley, Fort Niobrara NWR, Samuel R McKelvie National Forest
